name: 蔡坦欣
objective:
本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調人文專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。
This course aims to provide pre-service cultural business students/professionals with the adequate skills of the English language and communicative competence to facilitate their current academic and future career pursuits. Students are encouraged to utilize their domain expertise to participate in professional communication in English. Centered on the training of professional use of the English language, the ESP curriculum as the crux of a highly-integrated work of domain knowledge and the English learning development embodies the indispensable credentials required for a global profession.
schedule:
Week 1 9/10 Orientation; Defining Humanities
Week 2-3 Philosophy
Week 4-5 Historical Narrative
Week 5-6 Literature
Week 7 Brand Identity
Week 8 Review
Week 9 Midterm
Week 10-11 Art Criticism
Week 12-13 Clothing and Identity
Week 14-15 Migration and Cultural Integration
Week 16 review
Week 17- 18 Final (Group Oral Presentation)
scorePolicy:
Midterm Report 30%
Final Presentation 30%
會考 20%
平時 30%
